posts.name: Dinosaur Bar-B-Que
posts.note: Dinosaur Bar-B-Que started here is Syracuse and is now a barbecue chain serving Southern-style meats and draft brews in a retro setting (most have live music).

posts.name: Heid's of Liverpool
posts.note: Standby for hot dogs, sausages and other quick serve fare in nostalgic digs and adjacent ice cream shop. If you never have had a white hot (pork and veal hot dog) you need to order one here along with some fries.

posts.name: Market Diner
posts.note: Family-owned vintage diner with a mural of '50s-era stars serves up American comfort food. They have a two eggs, home fries, and toast for $4.99 and for a few dollars more youcan get bacon or sausage. It's a deal at such a low price.

posts.name: Pastabilities
posts.note: Contemporary eatery serves homemade pasta dishes and Italian-American fare in a warm, brick interior.
